tns:patch.keyword: Global settings for funding expandable list
tns:patch.author: vchihai
tns:patch.description: Add the ability to make the funding list expandable

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_global_settings (id, settingsname, settingsvalue, possiblevalues, description, section) VALUES (nextval('amp_global_settings_seq'), 'Make the funding item list expandable', 'false', 't_Boolean', 'The funding item list will be expandable. By default, the first 10 items will be shown.', 'funding');
